name: IT Governance Improvement - FinServ AG

situation.recent_events: Audit findings, new regulations in 18 months

expected_pain_points.pain: IT projects often delayed or over budget
expected_pain_points.monetization: Last three projects averaged 35% over budget - EUR 2.5M in overruns last year

expected_pain_points.pain: Shadow IT growing across business units
expected_pain_points.monetization: EUR 400,000 annually in shadow IT spending bypassing controls
Proper remediation requires 6 FTEs for 8 months - EUR 800,000

expected_pain_points.pain: Difficulty proving IT value to board
expected_pain_points.monetization: Non-compliance penalties could reach EUR 10 million

expected_pain_points.reveal_after: Deep trust established through excellent questioning
expected_pain_points.monetization: Board questioning if she's right person for digital transformation

expected_objections: Not sure external help is the answer
Need to see concrete ROI projections
success_criteria: Customer quantifies regulatory non-compliance risk and agrees to deeper assessment
